name: DejaVu (MrBaba, WinnymaruBaba)
description:
A little sheep is lost in his dreams and it sounds like a déjà vu.

A cute puzzle game playing with multiple parallel levels, looking a lot like each others. But there is more to meet the eyes...

The real concept of the game arrives in level 3, would you be able to solve it?

  • Z / UP ARROW KEY / SPACE to jump
  • Q / LEFT ARROW KEY to go left
  • D / RIGHT ARROW KEY to go right
  • ENTER / CRTL to interact
  • F1 to show/hide inventory
  • Alt+F4 to quit the game

The web version of the game may have some delay on the sound effects. For a better experience we suggest you to download the version corresponding to your OS (windows/mac/linux).

Made with GodotEngine.

WinnymaruBaba: Code & Game/Level Design

BabaDesBois: Code, Pixel Art, Sounds/Music
